title: Big Spin Bingo | Play the Best Free Bingo Game!

creator: Ruby Seven Studios Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Calling all daubers! Looking for the most fun playing FREE bingo games? Big Spin Bingo offers a HUGE variety of bingo rooms, a load of BIG SPIN mania and even more frenzy for FREE! Fortune awaits when you give the bingo wheel a spin at Big Spin Bingo!

B-9, O-62, I-28...BINGO! Blitz your way through over 20 bingo rooms and bash your personalized bingo dauber before you call out BINGO! Take on competitors from around the world in LIVE Bingo showdowns before showing off to your friends from the top of the leaderboard! Download Big Spin Bingo and bash all your favorite free bingo games anytime, anywhere!

Why Big Spin Bingo?
🔥 Choose from 20+ bingo rooms. Blitz CLASSIC Bingo or try Vacation Bingo and Festival Bingo with exciting NEW rooms added regularly
🔥 Play up to 4 BINGO CARDS at once!
🔥 Take down LIVE GAMES against players around the world
🔥 Receive daily ENERGY BONUSES to keep you in the game for FREE
🔥 Collect 9 different POWER-UPS to boost your game play
🔥 Use CUSTOMIZED daubers to highlight all the numbers that have been called out or alert you when you have BINGO!
🔥 Complete collectible puzzles to receive a large energy, coins or power-up boosts!
🔥 PLAY with friends or COMPETE on leaderboards!
🔥 Connect to Facebook or invite friends for BONUS CREDITS

CLASSIC BINGO
Get that lucky FREE bingo feeling playing CLASSIC bingo! Chat with friends and rivals or play with up to 4 cards at once to increase your chances!

BINGO VACATION
Play multi-bingo across the globe and enjoy a different cultural experience in each room! Each far off, exotic location contains different challenges to help you unlock and explore new destinations. Pack your daub for places like Hawaii, Rome, Venice, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Rio, Egypt, New York, Las Vegas and more…

FESTIVAL BINGO
Become a tourist visiting festivals around the world playing Festival Bingo. Drench yourself in tomatoes at ‘La Tomatina’ in Spain, celebrate Chinese New Year at the ‘Lantern’ Festival or celebrate ‘St Patrick’s Day with the Irish. With 15+ festival themes and new ones added regularly, there’s something for everyone playing Festival Bingo.

POWER UP BINGO
Put a fun TWIST on classic bingo with POWER BINGO. Use power-ups to add that little something extra to your game - like extra bonus points and DOUBLE wins!

HIGH ROLLER
Its high-risk and even higher-reward! Enjoy the bling and the thrill of winning BIG as you multiply your game 1x, 3x, 5x, 8x and 10x in our High Roller Bingo room.

CHRISTMAS BINGO
Daub numbers to help Santa collect Christmas gifts for his sack. Uncover 5 hidden gifts and its Christmas Bingo!

Follow Big Spin Bingo on Social
Like us on facebook.com/bigspinbingo for your chance to win FREE energy, coins and power ups every week!

This game is for amusement purposes only.
Big Spin Bingo is intended for players 21+ for entertainment purposes only and does not offer “real money gambling” or any opportunity to win real money through game play.
Playing Big Spin Bingo does not entail future success at “real money gaming”.
